before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fc62t","text":"*** Use only sterile RNAse-Free tubes - AM12425 - or sterile Axygen RNAse Free microtubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pfj6","text":"*** All calculations should be performed before the beginning of the procedure, since reagents and samples have high added value.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2mcdi","text":"Protocol used to eliminate DNA fragments and gDNA from purified RNA and to remove impurities from the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"a8elu","text":"Important considerations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2ped","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ulag","text":"***Multiplying by 1.06 for each reagent in solution preparation is required due to pipetting error.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"701gd","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aij92","text":"***Before starting read the protocol and ensure that the required volume of each reagent is available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gjir","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"734d4","text":"***75% ethanol should be prepared with NEW DEPC H2O and Molecular Biology Grade (200 Proof \u003e99.45%) Ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":39,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":39,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48s9i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c10mq","text":"***Prepare all solutions in advance or check that all solutions are available. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq90f","text":"***This protocol is to be used only with DNAse I M0303 from NEB. When using with another DNAse I, adjust the reaction volumes and adjust the final volume of the RNA precipitation mix to 700 uL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8otr3","text":"DNAse I (M0303S);","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tvik","text":"10X DNAse I Buffer;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qfkp","text":"Milli-Q water treated with 0.1% DEPC;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5onr","text":"4M ammonium acetate (NH₄CH₃CO₂) - Must be filtered through a 0.22um filter;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lm6a","text":"RNAse Free 0.5M EDTA pH 8.0 - Must be filtered through a 0.22um filter;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs4et","text":"Ethanol 75% - Molecular Biology 200 proof;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36auc","text":"New 50 mL Falcon tubes;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gkh0","text":"Pipettes: P1000, P200, P10;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6qk","text":"Pipette Tips: 1000, 200, 10 uL;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dav9k","text":"Thermomixer (37 ºC);","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5uv0","text":"Refrigerated centrifuge (4°C);","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46le3","text":"Ice;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0ctn","text":"Styrofoam Box;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b95ds","text":"Rack for 1.5 mL microtubes;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"294si","text":"Exhaust Chapel;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fidro","text":"Electrophoresis vat;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"231cb","text":"Agarose;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa391","text":"TAE 1X;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uhir","text":"Nanodrop, Microdrop or Qubit;","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oqd4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpqkm","text":"Starting with the 27 uL left over from each sample, add another 62 uL of RNAse-Free H2O at room temperature to all samples;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"768g6","text":"Prepare DNAse Mix I and add 11 uL of the Mix per sample;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3troh","text":"    10 uL of 10X DNAse I Buffer * No. of samples;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1g4s9","text":"    1 uL of DNAse I * No. of samples;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kq3f","text":"    __","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1o2p","text":"    11 uL * No. of samples * 1.06","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gdan","text":"*** Final reaction volume = 100 uL, adjust the final volume if less than 100 uL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sf6a","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ssv1","text":"Incubate the samples in the thermomixer at 37º C, without shaking, for 20 minutes;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e2j72","text":"Add 1 uL of RNAse Free 0.5M EDTA pH 8.0 to each sample;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9u1ir","text":"Incubate at 75°C for 10 minutes;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4j31u","text":"Prepare the RNA Precipitation Mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13fub","text":"    150 uL Water treated with 0.1% DEPC * No. of samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiqtb","text":"    100 uL 4M Ammonium Acetate * No. of samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e55t0","text":"    350 uL Ethanol 200 proof Molecular Biology Grade (99.45%) * No. of samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aslg","text":"    ____","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jjaq","text":"    600 uL of Mix * No. of samples * 1.06","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vlo2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dhpq","text":"Add 600 uL of the RNA Precipitation Mix to each sample and INVERT 20X using a microtube rack;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3j9du","text":"Incubate at -80°C for 30 minutes or overnight at -20°C;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fhika","text":"Centrifuge at 4°C for 20 minutes at 13,000 RPM;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4tr5r","text":"Discard the supernatant with the aid of pipette tips;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0n3j","text":"Add 300 uL of 75% Molecular Biology Grade Ethanol prepared with 0.1% DEPC-treated Milli-Q Water (only add to wash the pellet, and vortex for less than 1 second);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e0j4r","text":"Centrifuge at 4°C for 5 minutes at 13,000 RPM;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2geit","text":"Discard the supernatant with the aid of pipette tips;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hhlk","text":"Add 300 uL of 75% Ethanol for Molecular Biology prepared with 0.1% DEPC-treated Milli-Q Water (only add to wash the pellet, and vortex for less than 1 second);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ehq4","text":"Centrifuge at 4°C for 7 minutes at 13,000 RPM;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bp2c6","text":"Discard the supernatant with the aid of pipette tips;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23vs6","text":"Leave the tubes open in a 1.5 mL microtube rack in the fume hood for 5 minutes;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vah3","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 20 uL of 0.1% DEPC-treated Milli-Q Water at 60 °C from tube to tube, homogenizing moderately for 30 seconds per sample (use P20 in 15 uL volume);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mfsn","text":"Run 1.5% agarose gel in 1X TAE buffer + 5% bleach (80 V - 80 min);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm77q","text":"    ***The electrophoresis vat should be thoroughly cleaned with RNAse Zap + Distilled Water and fresh running buffer should be added, the gel polymerization tray should be thoroughly cleaned and the gel should be made with fresh buffer to avoid RNA degradation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jmr3","text":"If the RNA is intact (identify 18S and 28S rRNA bands at 2Kb and 4.8Kb), determine the concentration and quality parameters (A260/A230 and A260/A280) of the sample in the spectrophotometer/nanodrop;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eked9","text":"If RNA is used in more sensitive applications, quantify in Qubit;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aovd","text":"Store the samples in the ultra-freezer (-80 ºC) for up to 6 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: gDNA RNA Clean Up Protocol
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"23lt5","text":"***BOOK ALL EQUIPMENT IN ADVANCE AND CHECK THAT ALL MATERIAL WILL BE AVAILABLE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89dop","text":" ***KEEP SAMPLES ON ICE DURING ALL HANDLING, AND FREEZE AT -80ºC AFTER USE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef100","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
